title: How i became the greatest coder that ever lived
description:
--- robo-corp-99 ---

hello my name is randy coronado i coded the backend and the front end of this web app
This is my version of the website because my teammate didn't complete the html in team.

The code is simple, it handles request as submitting a post, title, descriptions, comments,
image_url locations. this communicates with the html file {post.id}, where it takes the 
string data from the python file and uses it in the html file. Of course we have javascript
handling some of the task and make it easier on the html file, it has location save when you are
scrolling and submitting a post so you don't have to re-scroll where you were at. it handles 
creating treads, and comments, and other buttons.

over all this was a easy project to make, css was more of a pain when creating this site. 


--- created by randy coronado ---
--- terms of use --- 
just don't sell my product or use it to make any kind of monetization. follow the law when posting -(optional).
comments: the greatest coder that ever lived!
